success_criteria: Unit test coverage >= 85%; SonarQube analysis passed (0 new bugs, 0 new vulnerabilities); All unit tests pass.
escalation_procedure: PR author must fix issues before merge.
business_impact: Prevents low-quality code and simple bugs from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: 100% of integration tests pass, including all security sandbox validation tests.
escalation_procedure: Tech lead review required for any failures.
business_impact: Prevents component-level bugs and security regressions.

success_criteria: E2E smoke test suite passes (>98%); Performance benchmark test passes (<10s execution time).
failure_action: Alert DevOps and QA Lead; Rollback deployment if critical.
business_impact: Ensures the staging environment is stable for manual testing and UAT.

success_criteria: Full manual regression suite completed; UAT sign-off received; No outstanding critical or high-severity bugs; Compliance documentation (audit trail design) reviewed and approved.
failure_action: Block production release; Schedule emergency bug fix sprint.
responsible_team: QA Lead, Product Owner, Compliance Officer
business_impact: Final gate to ensure a high-quality, compliant product is shipped to customers.
